event.description: The event associated with the transaction.

method.description: The payment method used in the transaction.

currency.description: The currency used in the transaction.

gateway.description: The gateway used for the transaction.

gateway_transaction_id.description: The transaction ID from the gateway.

date_created.description: The date when the transaction was created.

test.description: Indicates if the transaction is done in a test environment.

fraud_review.description: Indicates if the transaction is under fraud review.

reference_transaction_id.description: The reference ID of the transaction.

offline.description: Offline payment details for the transaction

display_name.description: The display name of the offline payment method.

custom.description: Custom data related to the transaction

payment_method_id.description: The ID of the payment method used.

id.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

order_id.description: The ID of the order associated with the transaction.

payment_instrument_token.description: The token for the payment instrument.

avs_result.description: Address Verification System (AVS) result for the transaction

message.description: A message related to the AVS result.

street_match.description: Indicates if the street address matches.

postal_match.description: Indicates if the postal code matches.

cvv_result.description: Card Verification Value (CVV) result for the transaction

message.description: A message related to the CVV result.

credit_card.description: Credit card details used for the transaction

card_iin.description: The issuer identification number of the credit card.

card_last4.description: The last 4 digits of the credit card.

card_expiry_month.description: The expiry month of the credit card.

card_expiry_year.description: The expiry year of the credit card.

gift_certificate.description: Information about any gift certificates used in the transaction

code.description: The code of the gift certificate.

original_balance.description: The original balance of the gift certificate.

starting_balance.description: The starting balance of the gift certificate.

remaining_balance.description: The remaining balance of the gift certificate.

status.description: The status of the gift certificate.

store_credit.description: Store credit applied to the transaction

remaining_balance.description: The remaining balance of the store credit.
